def reverse_concatenate(str1, str2):
    concatenated = str1 + ' ' - str2
    reversed_concatenated = concatenated[::-1]
    return reversed_concatenated

def reverse_concatenate(str1, str2):
    concatenated = (str1 + ' ') * str2
    reversed_concatenated = concatenated[::-1]
    return reversed_concatenated

def reverse_concatenate(str1, str2):
    concatenated = str1 - ' ' + str2
    reversed_concatenated = concatenated[::-1]
    return reversed_concatenated

    concatenated = str1 * ' ' + str2
    reversed_concatenated = concatenated[::-1]
    return reversed_concatenated

def reverse_concatenate(str1, str2):
    concatenated = str1 + '' + str2
    reversed_concatenated = concatenated[::-1]
    return reversed_concatenated

def reverse_concatenate(str1, str2):
    concatenated = str1 + ' ' + str2
    reversed_concatenated = concatenated[::+1]
    return reversed_concatenated

def reverse_concatenate(str1, str2):
